{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Creative Designer",
  "description": "Golden Line Global Services Limited is a recruitment agency committed to bridging top-tier employers with exceptional talent across industries. Established to deliver tailored recruitment solutions, our mission is to facilitate seamless, efficient, and strategic hiring processes that drive success for both organizations and professionals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Creative Designer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We&#39;re recruiting a creative designer for a client that operates in the travel industry. As the Creative Designer, you will be responsible for blending art and technology to produce visually engaging designs across various media&mdash;including websites, blogs, social media platforms, publications, and other company materials&mdash;to effectively promote the company&rsquo;s products, services, and overall objectives.


Job Responsibilities


	Create visual concepts that would attract, inform and captivate consumers on the company&rsquo;s website, blogs, and social media platforms using various graphics softwares
	Develop concepts, designs and layouts for product illustrations, marketing campaigns and media platforms
	Innovatively design advertising/marketing materials and ideas and bring them to life graphically
	Work closely as part of a team with digital media executive, web developers and marketing specialist to produce high quality work
	Work with a range of media including photography and computer &ndash; aided design (CAD) to create designs and keeping up to date emerging technologies
	Present ideas to management on product development, identity building and constantly coming up with strategies will improve the unit
	Enhance our websites and blogs with images and videos that would attract and retain a target audience
	Conceptualize, create, design and format marketing materials in all media, i.e., sketches and digital illustrations that would meet the digital needs of the company
	Develop graphics layout and production designs for advertisement, brochures, and magazines


Background and Requirement


	First Degree in a related field
	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience.
	Experience in the travel industry and working with multiple stakeholders is an added advantage
	Excellent IT skills, especially with design and photo-editing software
	Excellent communication skills
	Proficiency with required desktop publishing tools, including Photoshop, Corel draw, Illustrator etc.
	Exceptional creativity and innovation
	Excellent time management and organizational skills
	Accuracy and attention to detail
	An understanding of the latest trends and their role within a commercial environment
	Professional approach to time, costs and deadlines.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-01",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-02",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

Creative Designer Job at Golden Line Global Services Limited




        
    

        
        Golden Line Global Services Limited is a recruitment agency committed to bridging top-tier employers with exceptional talent across industries. Established to deliver tailored recruitment solutions, our mission is to facilitate seamless, efficient, and strategic hiring processes that drive success for both organizations and professionals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Creative Designer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're recruiting a creative designer for a client that operates in the travel industry. As the Creative Designer, you will be responsible for blending art and technology to produce visually engaging designs across various media—including websites, blogs, social media platforms, publications, and other company materials—to effectively promote the company’s products, services, and overall objectives.


Job Responsibilities


	Create visual concepts that would attract, inform and captivate consumers on the company’s website, blogs, and social media platforms using various graphics softwares
	Develop concepts, designs and layouts for product illustrations, marketing campaigns and media platforms
	Innovatively design advertising/marketing materials and ideas and bring them to life graphically
	Work closely as part of a team with digital media executive, web developers and marketing specialist to produce high quality work
	Work with a range of media including photography and computer – aided design (CAD) to create designs and keeping up to date emerging technologies
	Present ideas to management on product development, identity building and constantly coming up with strategies will improve the unit
	Enhance our websites and blogs with images and videos that would attract and retain a target audience
	Conceptualize, create, design and format marketing materials in all media, i.e., sketches and digital illustrations that would meet the digital needs of the company
	Develop graphics layout and production designs for advertisement, brochures, and magazines


Background and Requirement


	First Degree in a related field
	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience.
	Experience in the travel industry and working with multiple stakeholders is an added advantage
	Excellent IT skills, especially with design and photo-editing software
	Excellent communication skills
	Proficiency with required desktop publishing tools, including Photoshop, Corel draw, Illustrator etc.
	Exceptional creativity and innovation
	Excellent time management and organizational skills
	Accuracy and attention to detail
	An understanding of the latest trends and their role within a commercial environment
	Professional approach to time, costs and deadlines.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Operations Manager (Head of Operations) Job at Patrisan Jozzy Recruitment
content:
Patrisan Jozzy Recruitment - Our client, a logistics company in the E-commerce industry, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager (Head of Operations)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Purpose
     

            
    




	The Operations Manager (Head of Operations) will oversee and coordinate the company’s entire operational framework, ensuring seamless last-mile delivery services in partnership with third-party logistics (3PL) providers.
	The role focuses on managing E-commerce delivery operations, maintaining service quality, resolving operational issues, and leveraging data analysis to optimize performance, reduce costs, and enhance client satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities
Operational Management:


	Oversee daily delivery operations in collaboration with 3PL partners.
	Ensure parcels are received, processed, and delivered within agreed timelines and service standards.
	Monitor and evaluate the performance of 3PL partners to ensure compliance with SLA agreements.
	Develop and enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs) for quality service delivery.


Team Leadership & Supervision:


	Manage and support hub supervisors, operations staff, and dispatch coordinators.
	Set performance standards, conduct regular reviews, and provide feedback for continuous improvement.
	Provide training and guidance to staff on operational processes and customer service.


Client & Stakeholder Management:


	Serve as the primary point of contact for the company on all operational matters.
	Manage day-to-day communication and relationship and address delivery issues promptly.
	Coordinate with 3PL providers to ensure they meet company’s service expectations.
	Escalate and resolve complaints or challenges that could affect client satisfaction.


Performance Monitoring, Data Analysis & Reporting:


	Collect and analyze data on parcel volumes, delivery times, failed deliveries, and customer feedback.
	Track and measure key KPIs such as on-time delivery rate, success rate, incident rate, and partner performance.
	Generate and present detailed reports and dashboards to management highlighting trends, risks, and improvement opportunities.
	Use data-driven insights to recommend process adjustments that improve efficiency and reduce cost.


Compliance & Risk Management:


	Ensure adherence to regulatory standards and client-specific requirements.
	Monitor parcel security and handling procedures to prevent loss, tampering, or theft.
	Coordinate with security agencies and partners when required to ensure safe delivery operations.


Resource & Cost Control:


	Manage operational budgets related to partner payments, hub running costs, and other delivery expenses.
	Negotiate with 3PL partners to secure cost-effective and reliable service.
	Optimize resource allocation through effective partner and route planning.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Logistics, Supply Chain, Data Analytics, or related field (Master’s degree is an advantage).
	Minimum of 7–10 years of experience in operations management, preferably within courier, logistics, or e-commerce.
	Proven experience managing 3PL partners and client-facing operations.
	Strong data analysis skills (Excel, Power BI, SQL, or other analytics tools).
	Excellent problem-solving and negotiation skills.
	Strong leadership and people management ability.
	Exceptional communication and client relationship management skills.


Salary
N350,000 - N400,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: susaneze5@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

	Ensuring goods are handled efficiently and accurately

Warehouse Manager Job at Macden Communications Limited




        
    

        
        Macden Communications Limited is into the production and distribution of beverages and is a major distributor for Nigerian Breweries Limited and International Breweries Plc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Manager
Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversees facility receiving storage and shipping operations
	Ensuring goods are handled efficiently and accurately
	Operations management
	Process improvement
	Inventory Control
	Logistics Cordination
	Reporting and Analyzing
	Facility Management
	Staff Leadership.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND / Bachelor's Degree with 5 - 7 years working experience.
	The working hours are from 8am to 6pm from Mondays to Saturdays and on public holidays and you may be expected to work for longer hours outside your working hours.
	Expected applicants must be resident in Lagos State and expected applicant must apply with Ikeja axis Ogba axis Ketu axis Ojota axis Ojodu axis Berger axis
	He must have warehouse experience from 5-7 years and must be able to show team leadership and be able to control the staffs working together with him.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 per month. 

Application Closing Date
30th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: patricia_asemota@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires call 09063461304.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Receptionist / Administrative Assistant Job at Global Oneword Healthcare Limited




        
    

        
        Global Oneword Healthcare Limited is a pharmaceutical company specialized in importation and distribution of medicines.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist / Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Coker Orile, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a smart, creative, and organized individual to join our team as a Receptionist/Administrative Assistant.
	This role combines front desk/reception responsibilities with creative support in media design and communication.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Greet and attend to visitors, clients, and staff at the front desk in a professional manner.
	Manage phone calls, emails, and other correspondence.
	Assist with scheduling meetings and maintaining office records.
	Design simple flyers, banners, and promotional materials using Canva.
	Create birthday videos, company greetings, and other digital content to support staff welfare and brand visibility.
	Support social media updates and internal communications.
	Assist with organizing company events and celebrations.
	Provide general administrative support to different departments when required.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / Diploma in any field.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Basic design skills with Canva or similar tools.
	Ability to multitask and pay attention to detail.
	Good organizational and time-management skills.
	Positive attitude and willingness to learn.


What We Offer


	A supportive and friendly work environment.
	Opportunities to grow skills in administration, media, and communications.
	A good compensation.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: blessing@globaloneword.com.ng using the Job Position as the Subject of the email.
